thread.title: The Beacon Group Welcomes Eric Salo as Director in Industrials Practice

author: cnbc.com
title: The Beacon Group Welcomes Eric Salo as Director in Industrials Practice
text:
PORTLAND, Maine, Feb. 20, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- The Beacon Group is pleased to announce the appointment of Eric Salo as Director joining our Industrials practice. Mr. Salo will work alongside Vice President of Industrials, Jesse Toronto, and Beacon's President and CEO Cliff Farrah.
"Eric's addition to the team continues to beef up Beacon's fastest growing practice. We are working on groundbreaking topics in the industrials practice, and Eric's experience will be sure to add another layer of value as we help our clients succeed in their markets," said Cliff Farrah, Beacon's President and CEO.
Eric most recently served as Global Business Manager at Lear Corporation where he oversaw product planning, business development and global sales strategies for key automotive OEM clients. Eric will add a product development and lens to Beacon's already robust background of in-industry experience.
"Eric will be a great addition to our Industrials practice. His extensive product, strategy, and business development industry experience will be tremendously valuable to our team and to our clients," said Vice President of Industrials and Energy Jesse Toronto.
Eric holds an MBA from IE University in Madrid, Spain along with a Bachelor of Science in Biochemistry from Oakland University.
